wikipedia_page.main: Devonte Vincent Redmond (born 19 September 1996) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Kidderminster Harriers on loan from National League club Wrexham.

response: Edwards has a son, Devonte Redmond, who plays for Wrexham as a midfielder.
